question: The Asian Development Bank has agreed to give an aid of Rs 1,700 crore to __________ for the creation of infrastructural facilities.
explanation: The Asian Development Bank has agreed to give an aid of Rs 1,700 crore to Uttarakhand. The aid will be given for the creation of infrastructural facilities, sewer treatment plants and water supply facilities in urban areas of Uttarakhand. This was conveyed to Chief Minister of Uttrakhand by the country director of ADB's India Regiment Mission.
